character.background: Born in the heart of the Whispering Woods, Elijah spent most of his early life in seclusion, being taught the ancient arts of the forest and its creatures. The traditions and values taught to him by his ancestors guide his every step and decision, defining him as one of the most skilled and respectful rangers of his time. His connection with nature and the raw power he wields often leaves both his allies and enemies at a life-changing crossroads.
